edu.umw.cpsc.collegediversity
Class OrientationGroup

java.lang.Object
  edu.umw.cpsc.collegediversity.Group
      edu.umw.cpsc.collegediversity.OrientationGroup

public class OrientationGroup
extends Group

A special kind of group intended for just freshmen. Every new Student will be assigned to an orientation group with several other students during that first year.
